title: Wrench & screw (Manufacturing company)
description: Wrench & screw is a website based on tools manufacturing company. This is a full-stack project with both user & admin functionalities. For client side React, Tailwind, DaisyUI, Firebase, Stripe, React router are used. And for backend we used Nodejs, Expressjs & MongoDB. Any particular user can see all products, available quantity,minimum order quantity, customers review etc by visiting this website. User can place an order & also he/she can payment for that product online (Card payment only). We also have a user dashboard where users can see their orders,add a review & see their profile. They can also edit their profile & pay for unpaid orders in my order section. We implemented another dashboard only for admins. Admin can update product quantity or delete in manage products section, can add a new product, see all the orders placed by client & admin can also make another user as admin.

title: Eastwood (Warehouse)
description: Eastwood is a warehouse based application. This is specially made for admin to maintain warehouse products. At homepage client can see some products. Clicking on one of them will take him to a page where he can update the product quantity or mark that as delivered. At manage inventory page admin can see all of the available stock products & their quantity. Admin can also delete a particular product if he wants. Admin can add a new product at add inventory page. Their could be more than one admin so we added another page called my items where admin see only those products that are added by him. Signing option is also implemented for this website where client can sign in/ Sign up by google,facebook & by filling form.

title: Influencer products (Gadget store)
description: Influencer products is a static gadget store based website. This project was made by bootstrap. This is a one page application & we kept it nice & simple. At header you will see a small introduction & an image. Then there are some product cards with image, price, review & description. Down of that there is a section for our newsletter & lastly we added as simple footer.

title: Dazzle dentist (Dental chamber)
description: Dazzle dentist is a dental chamber based static website. At homepage you will se a slider & some of our services at header. Then we added our detailed services in service section. Their is a about me section where an image & detailed information is given. Afterwards we added some certifications & lastly our location with a footer.
